intro: Endogonia, commonly known as the genus *Endogonia*, is a group of flowering plants belonging to the family Apiaceae, also known as the carrot or parsley family. These plants are characterized by their aromatic foliage and often have small, clustered flowers. Endogonia species typically grow in temperate regions and are found in various habitats, including grasslands and woodlands. They are known for their medicinal properties and have been used in traditional herbal remedies. The genus includes several species, such as *Endogonia scabrida*, which is native to southern Africa.
